Name: Fluffert and Friends
About the game: Meet Fluffert the Owl who likes to hang out with his cute Animal friends. One day his beloved Grandfather Alfred goes missing, so his parents send Fluffert on a journey to find him. On his way, little Owl will face many tricky quests and funny adventures. Join him to enjoy multiple hours of Platformer Game experience involving actions like Attacking, Jumping, Running and Exploring. Prepare yourself for an engaging Platformer Game including Animal World exploration, Cutscenes, and beautiful 3D Graphics to take you beyond the boundaries of your imagination! Imagine Exploring Platformer with 3D beautiful graphics by playing the Owl.
